data.expected_result: Designer name should not overlap play button
data.short_description: On 200 zoom, when viewing the game modal of a game that splits into two lines, the game designer name is partially hidden by the play button
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your zoom level to 200% - Open the game modal of a game such as PUBG (PlayerUknown's Battleground) or Deus Ex: Mankind Divided - Observe how the name of the designer overlaps the "Play" button
